data.eml:eml: Systematics of a widely distributed western North American springsnail, Pyrgulopsis micrococcus (Caenogastropoda, Hydrobiidae), with descriptions of three new congeners

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hershler, Robert, Liu, Hsiu-Ping, Bradford, Corbin (2013): Systematics of a widely distributed western North American springsnail, Pyrgulopsis micrococcus (Caenogastropoda, Hydrobiidae), with descriptions of three new congeners. ZooKeys 330: 27-52, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.330.5852, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.330.5852
